Files Headings

mock_request.js

 
"use strict";

A mock version of the http.ClientRequest class

 
module.exports = function MockRequest(opts) {
  if (opts == null) {
    opts = {};
  }

  this.url = "/";

  this.headers = {};
  this.params = {};

  for (var opt in opts) {
    this[opt] = opts[opt];
  }
};
